mapper.sql: id, user_id, membership_card_id, send_money, status, updated, created
mapper.select: select a.id, a.user_id, a.membership_card_id, a.send_money, a.status, a.updated, a.created, b.user_id as targetUserId, c.nickname, c.avatar, d.title, d.logo, f.card_no, g.card_no as targetCardNo from transfer_send a left join transfer_send_detail b on a.id = b.transfer_send_id left join app_user c on b.user_id = c.id left join membership_card d on a.membership_card_id = d.id left join user_member_card f on a.membership_card_id = f.membership_card_id and a.user_id = f.user_id left join user_member_card g on a.membership_card_id = g.membership_card_id and b.user_id = g.user_id where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.membership_card_id = #{cardId} order by a.created DESC

select a.id, a.user_id, a.membership_card_id, a.send_money, a.status, a.updated, a.created, b.user_id as targetUserId, c.nickname, c.avatar, d.title, d.logo, f.card_no, g.card_no as targetCardNo from transfer_send a left join transfer_send_detail b on a.id = b.transfer_send_id left join app_user c on b.user_id = c.id left join membership_card d on a.membership_card_id = d.id left join user_member_card f on a.membership_card_id = f.membership_card_id and a.user_id = f.user_id left join user_member_card g on a.membership_card_id = g.membership_card_id and b.user_id = g.user_id where a.id = #{transferSendId}
mapper.insert: insert into transfer_send (id, user_id, membership_card_id, send_money, status, updated, created) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{membershipCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, now(), now())

insert into transfer_send
id,
user_id,
membership_card_id,
send_money,
status,
updated,
created,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{membershipCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sendMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update transfer_send
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
membership_card_id = #{membershipCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
send_money = #{sendMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update transfer_send set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, membership_card_id = #{membershipCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, send_money = #{sendMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
